https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/suTAWYLIHAnkH2V4nC8t3AG7HjR.jpg Huo An, the commander of the Protection Squad of the Western Regions, was framed by evil forces and becomes enslaved. On the other hand, a Roman general escapes to China after rescuing the Prince. The heroic duo meet in the Western Desert and a thrilling story unfolds. Dragon Blade
